LanguageData.Bumber_CombatDebuff.label: encumbered combat
LanguageData.Bumber_CombatDebuff.description: Worse accuracy and aiming speed while using an umbrella to block sunlight or weather.
LanguageData.Bumber_WorkDebuff.label: encumbered work
LanguageData.Bumber_WorkDebuff.description: Reduced work speed while using an umbrella to block sunlight or weather.
